title: [Northwest Tower, Roof]
description: The flags of the city militia flutter from the four corners of the square tower, proclaiming to a great distance the manning of the city defenses.  To the north lies a great expanse of glacial ice, while to the west the snowy plains are cut by walls and trenches.  In the opposite direction, the city of Icemule Trace gleams like platinum dust in the moonlight.

The flags of the city militia flutter from the four corners of the square tower, proclaiming to a great distance the manning of the city defenses.  To the north lies a great expanse of glacial ice, while to the west the snowy plains are cut by walls and trenches.  In the opposite direction, the city of Icemule Trace gleams like a frost opal in the sun.
